00141 template<class NTYPE, class ETYPE>
00142 bool tpGrid<NTYPE, ETYPE>::CheckGrid(void) const
00143 {
00144   bool ret=true;
00145 
00146   try
00147   {
00148     // Check initial grid
00149     ret = ret && CheckElementConnections();
00150     ret = ret && CheckNodeConnections();
00151     ret = ret && CheckElementParentGrid();
00152   }
00153 
00154   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00155   {
00156     EX.AddMethodToTree("tpGrid::CheckGrid");
00157     throw EX;
00158   }
00159 
00160   return(ret);
00161 }
00162 
00163 template<class NTYPE, class ETYPE>
00164 bool tpGrid<NTYPE, ETYPE>::CheckElementConnections(void) const
00165 {
00166   bool ret=true;
00167 
00168   try
00169   {
00170     // Loop through all elements
00171     for(int e=0; e<GetNumberElements(); e++)
00172     {
00173       ETYPE* activeElement     = theElementList.GetItemPointer(e);
00174       int    activeID          = activeElement->GetNumberID();
00175       int    numberConnections = 0;
00176 
00177       // Loop through faces and find element that is referred to
00178       for(int activeFace=0; activeFace<activeElement->GetNumberFaces(); activeFace++)
00179       {
00180         int passiveID = activeElement->GetNeighbourID(activeFace);
00181 
00182         if(passiveID!=-1)
00183         {
00184           int    passiveIndex   = GetElementIndex(passiveID);
00185           ETYPE* passiveElement = theElementList.GetItemPointer(passiveIndex);
00186 
00187           // Check if passiveElement also refers to activeElement
00188           int  passiveFace = 0;
00189           bool succes      = false;
00190           while(passiveFace<passiveElement->GetNumberFaces() && !succes)
00191           {
00192             if(passiveElement->GetNeighbourID(passiveFace) == activeID)
00193             {
00194               succes = true;
00195               numberConnections++;
00196             }
00197 
00198             passiveFace++;
00199           }
00200 
00201           if(!succes)
00202           {
00203             ret=false;
00204 
00205             // passiveElement does NOT refer to activeElement
00206             char message[MESLEN];
00207             sprintf(message, "Error in grid.\n    %d.%d is one-way connected to %d, ", activeID, activeFace, passiveID);
00208             throw clExceptionTree("tpGrid", "CheckElementConnections", message);
00209           }
00210         }
00211         else
00212         {
00213           // Passive element is halo cell; do not check
00214           numberConnections++;
00215         }
00216       }
00217 
00218       if(numberConnections<activeElement->GetNumberFaces())
00219       {
00220         ret=false;
00221 
00222         char message[MESLEN];
00223         sprintf(message, "Error in grid; could not find connection.\n    ELEMENTID = %d", activeID);
00224         throw clExceptionTree("tpGrid", "CheckElementConnections", message);
00225       }
00226     }
00227   }
00228 
00229   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00230   {
00231     EX.AddMethodToTree("tpGrid::CheckElementConnections");
00232     throw EX;
00233   }
00234 
00235   return(ret);
00236 }
00237 
00238 template<class NTYPE, class ETYPE>
00239 bool tpGrid<NTYPE, ETYPE>::CheckNodeConnections(void) const
00240 {
00241   int ret=true;
00242 
00243   try
00244   {
00245     // Loop through all nodes
00246     for(int n=0; n<GetNumberNodes(); n++)
00247     {
00248       NTYPE* node = theNodeList.GetItemPointer(n);
00249       if(node->GetNumberElements() == 0)
00250       {
00251         ret=false;
00252 
00253         char message[MESLEN];
00254         sprintf(message, "Error in grid; floating node detected.\n    NODEID = %d", node->GetNumberID());
00255         throw clExceptionTree("tpGrid", "CheckNodeConnections", message);
00256       }
00257     }
00258   }
00259 
00260   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00261   {
00262     EX.AddMethodToTree("tpGrid::CheckNodeConnections");
00263     throw EX;
00264   }
00265 
00266   return(ret);
00267 }

00269 template<class NTYPE, class ETYPE>
00270 bool tpGrid<NTYPE, ETYPE>::CheckElementParentGrid(void) const
00271 {
00272   int ret=true;
00273 
00274   try
00275   {
00276     // Loop through all elements
00277     for(int e=0; e<GetNumberElements(); e++)
00278     {
00279       ETYPE *element = theElementList.GetItemPointer(e);
00280       if(!element->GetParentGrid())
00281       {
00282         ret=false;
00283 
00284         char message[MESLEN];
00285         sprintf(message, "Error in grid; element has no Parent Grid.\nPerform binding to Parent Grid prior to CheckGrid.\n    ELEMENTID = %d", element->GetNumberID());
00286         throw clExceptionTree("tpGrid", "CheckElementParentGrid", message);
00287       }
00288     }
00289   }
00290 
00291   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00292   {
00293     EX.AddMethodToTree("tpGrid::CheckElementParentGrid");
00294     throw EX;
00295   }
00296 
00297   return(ret);
00298 }

00318 template<class NTYPE, class ETYPE>
00319 int tpGrid<NTYPE, ETYPE>::GetNewElementID(void)
00320 {
00321   int lastElementID = 0;
00322 
00323   if(GetNumberElements()>0)
00324   {
00325     int    index       = GetNumberElements()-1;
00326     ETYPE *lastElement = GetElementPointer(index);
00327     lastElementID      = lastElement->GetNumberID();
00328   }
00329 
00330   return(lastElementID+1);
00331 }
00332 
00333 template<class NTYPE, class ETYPE>
00334 int tpGrid<NTYPE, ETYPE>::GetNewNodeID(void)
00335 {
00336   int lastNodeID = 0;
00337 
00338   if(GetNumberNodes()>0)
00339   {
00340     int    index    = GetNumberNodes()-1;
00341     NTYPE *lastNode = GetNodePointer(index);
00342     lastNodeID      = lastNode->GetNumberID();
00343   }
00344 
00345   return(lastNodeID+1);
00346 }

00348 template<class NTYPE, class ETYPE>
00349 int tpGrid<NTYPE, ETYPE>::GetElementIndex(const int ID) const
00350 {
00351   int index = 0;
00352 
00353   try
00354   {
00355     int numberElements = theElementList.GetNumberItems();
00356 
00357     while(index<numberElements && theElementList(index).GetNumberID()!=ID)
00358     {
00359       index++;
00360     }
00361 
00362     if(index==numberElements)
00363     {
00364       char message[MESLEN];
00365       sprintf(message, "Could not find element.\n    ELEMENTID = %d", ID);
00366       throw clExceptionTree("tpGrid", "GetElementIndex", message);
00367     }
00368   }
00369 
00370   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00371   {
00372     EX.AddMethodToTree("tpGrid::GetElementIndex");
00373     throw EX;
00374   }
00375 
00376   return(index);
00377 }

00379 template<class NTYPE, class ETYPE>
00380 int tpGrid<NTYPE, ETYPE>::GetNodeIndex(const int theNodeID) const
00381 {
00382   //
00383   // Returns the nodeIndex for a given nodeID, using the grid System
00384   //
00385 
00386   int index = 0;
00387 
00388   try
00389   {
00390     int numberNodes=theNodeList.GetNumberItems();
00391 
00392     while(index<numberNodes && theNodeList(index).GetNumberID()!=theNodeID)
00393     {
00394       index++;
00395     }
00396 
00397     if(index==numberNodes)
00398     {
00399       char message[MESLEN];
00400       sprintf(message, "Could not find node.\n    NODEID = %d", theNodeID);
00401       throw clExceptionTree("tpGrid", "GetNodeIndex", message);
00402     }
00403   }
00404 
00405   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00406   {
00407     EX.AddMethodToTree("tpGrid::GetNodeIndex");
00408     throw EX;
00409   }
00410 
00411   return(index);
00412 }

00444 template<class NTYPE, class ETYPE>
00445 int tpGrid<NTYPE, ETYPE>::AddNode(const NTYPE theNode)
00446 {
00447   //
00448   // IN : theNode   = the new node
00449   // OUT: newNodeID = ID of new node
00450   //
00451   int newNodeID = 1;
00452 
00453   try
00454   {
00455     if(theNodeList.GetNumberItems()>0)
00456     {
00457       newNodeID = this->GetNewNodeID();
00458     }
00459 
00460     theNodeList.AddItem(theNode);
00461   }
00462 
00463   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00464   {
00465     EX.AddMethodToTree("tpGrid::AddNode");
00466     throw EX;
00467   }
00468 
00469   return(newNodeID);
00470 }
00471 
00472 template<class NTYPE, class ETYPE>
00473 void tpGrid<NTYPE, ETYPE>::DeleteNode(const int nodeID)
00474 {
00475   //
00476   // IN : nodeID = ID of node to be deleted
00477   // OUT: -
00478   //
00479 
00480   try
00481   {
00482     int    nodeIndex = GetNodeIndex(nodeID);
00483     NTYPE *node      = GetNodePointer(nodeIndex);
00484 
00485     // Delete element references to the node
00486     for(int e=0; e<node->GetNumberElements(); e++)
00487     {
00488       int    elementID    = node->GetElementID(e);
00489       int    elementIndex = GetElementIndex(elementID);
00490       ETYPE *element      = GetElementPointer(elementIndex);
00491 
00492       element->DeleteNodeRef(element->GetNodeIndex(nodeID));
00493     }
00494 
00495     // Delete the node itself
00496     theNodeList.DeleteItem(nodeIndex);
00497   }
00498 
00499   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00500   {
00501     EX.AddMethodToTree("tpGrid::DeleteNode");
00502     throw EX;
00503   }
00504 }

00512 template<class NTYPE, class ETYPE>
00513 int tpGrid<NTYPE, ETYPE>::AddElement(const ETYPE theElement)
00514 {
00515   int newElementID = 1;
00516 
00517   try
00518   {
00519     if(theElementList.GetNumberItems()>0)
00520     {
00521       newElementID = this->GetNewElementID();
00522     }
00523 
00524     theElementList.AddItem(theElement);
00525   }
00526 
00527   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00528   {
00529     EX.AddMethodToTree("tpGrid::AddElement");
00530     throw EX;
00531   }
00532 
00533   return(newElementID);
00534 }

00536 template<class NTYPE, class ETYPE>
00537 void tpGrid<NTYPE, ETYPE>::DeleteElement(const int theElementID)
00538 {
00539   //
00540   // IN : theElementID = ID of element to be deleted
00541   // OUT: -
00542   //
00543 
00544   try
00545   {
00546     int            theElementIndex = GetElementIndex(theElementID);
00547     ETYPE* theElement      = theElementList.GetItemPointer(theElementIndex);
00548 
00549     // Delete the references from the nodes to this element
00550     for(int n=0; n<theElement->GetNumberNodes(); n++)
00551     {
00552       int theNodeID = theElement->GetNodeID(n);
00553 
00554       if(theNodeID!=-1)
00555       {
00556         int       theNodeIndex = GetNodeIndex(theNodeID);
00557         NTYPE *theNode      = theNodeList.GetItemPointer(theNodeIndex);
00558 
00559         theNode->DeleteElementRefByID(theElementID);
00560       }
00561     }
00562 
00563     // Delete the references from the neighbour elements to this element
00564     for(int e=0; e<theElement->GetNumberFaces(); e++)
00565     {
00566       // Get neighbour from element
00567       int theNeighbourID = theElement->GetNeighbourID(e);
00568 
00569       // Check for halo cells
00570       if(theNeighbourID!=-1)
00571       {
00572         int            theNeighbourIndex = GetElementIndex(theNeighbourID);
00573         ETYPE* theNeighbour      = theElementList.GetItemPointer(theNeighbourIndex);
00574 
00575         // Search in neighbour for element and delete
00576         for(int f=0; f<theNeighbour->GetNumberFaces(); f++)
00577         {
00578           if(theNeighbour->GetNeighbourID(f)==theElementID)
00579           {
00580             theNeighbour->DeleteNeighbourRef(f); //->SetNeighbourID(f, -1);
00581           }
00582         }
00583       }
00584     }
00585 
00586     // Delete the element itself
00587     theElementList.DeleteItem(theElementIndex);
00588   }
00589 
00590   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00591   {
00592     EX.AddMethodToTree("tpGrid::DeleteElement");
00593     throw EX;
00594   }
00595 }

00612 template<class NTYPE, class ETYPE>
00613 void tpGrid<NTYPE, ETYPE>::DumpGrid(const char* fileName) const
00614 {
00615   try
00616   {
00617     fstream fout;
00618     fout.open(fileName, ios::out);
00619     fout.precision(3);
00620     if (fout.good())
00621     {
00622       DumpNodes(fout);
00623       DumpElements(fout);
00624       fout.close();
00625     }
00626     else
00627     {
00628       throw clExceptionTree("tpGrid", "DumpGrid", "Could not open dump-file.");
00629     }
00630   }
00631 
00632   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00633   {
00634     EX.AddMethodToTree("tpGrid::DumpGrid");
00635     throw EX;
00636   }
00637 }
00638 
00639 template<class NTYPE, class ETYPE>
00640 void tpGrid<NTYPE, ETYPE>::DumpNodes(fstream &fout) const
00641 {
00642   try
00643   {
00644     // Dump all nodes with the element-references
00645     fout << "NODE ID;COORDS;ELEMENTS;" << endl;
00646     for(int n=0; n<theNodeList.GetNumberItems(); n++)
00647     {
00648       NTYPE *node  = theNodeList.GetItemPointer(n);
00649       fout << node->GetNumberID() << ";";
00650 
00651       tpMatrix<double> coord = node->GetCoordinates();
00652       for(int r=0; r<coord.GetNumberRows(); r++)
00653       {
00654         fout << coord(r+1, 1) << ";";
00655       }
00656 
00657       for(int e=0; e<node->GetNumberElements(); e++)
00658       {
00659         fout << node->GetElementID(e) << ";";
00660       }
00661       fout << endl;
00662     }
00663     fout << endl;
00664   }
00665 
00666   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00667   {
00668     EX.AddMethodToTree("tpGrid::DumpNodes");
00669     throw EX;
00670   }
00671 }
00672 
00673 template<class NTYPE, class ETYPE>
00674 void tpGrid<NTYPE, ETYPE>::DumpElements(fstream &fout) const
00675 {
00676   try
00677   {
00678     // Dump all elements with neighbour-references and node-references
00679     fout << "ELEMENT ID;NEIGHBOUR REFERENCES;;;;NODE REFERENCES;;;" << endl;
00680     for(int e=0; e<theElementList.GetNumberItems(); e++)
00681     {
00682       ETYPE *element = theElementList.GetItemPointer(e);
00683       if(!element->IsHalo())
00684       {
00685         fout << element->GetNumberID() << ";";
00686 
00687         for(int nb=0; nb<element->GetNumberFaces(); nb++)
00688         {
00689           fout << element->GetNeighbourID(nb) << ";";
00690         }
00691 
00692         for(int no=0; no<element->GetNumberNodes(); no++)
00693         {
00694           fout << element->GetNodeID(no) << ";";
00695         }
00696         fout << endl;
00697       }
00698     }
00699     fout << endl;
00700   }
00701 
00702   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00703   {
00704     EX.AddMethodToTree("tpGrid::DumpElements");
00705     throw EX;
00706   }
00707 }
